TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebPartZoneCollection extends System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class WebPartZoneCollection Inherits ReadOnlyCollectionBase

summary.span: 包含 控件的只读集合。

span.span: Contains a read-only collection of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类包含 Web 部件页上存在的控件的集合。The class contains the collection of controls that exist on a Web Parts page. 它主要由 控件用于跟踪和管理所有区域。It is used primarily by the control to track and manage all the zones. 控件在其只读属性中保留对某个页面上区域集合的引用 。The control keeps a reference to the collection of zones on a page in its read-only property. 当你希望同时在多个区域或其内容上执行操作时，或者当你需要查找特定区域并检查或更改其内容时，此类很有用。The class is useful when you want to carry out operations on multiple zones or their contents at the same time, or when you need to locate a particular zone and examine or change its contents. 虽然区域的集合是只读的，并且您无法更改集合对象本身的大小，但您仍可以获取对集合中各个区域的引用，并且当您具有对单个区域对象的引用时，可以更改其属性值。Although the collection of zones itself is read-only and you cannot change the size of the collection object itself, you can still get references to the individual zones within the collection, and when you have a reference to an individual zone object, you can change its property values. 类具有两个构造函数。The class has two constructors. 第一个是， 只是初始化新的空实例 。The first one, , simply initializes an empty instance of a new . 第二种 方法是通过传入现有区域集合来初始化集合。The second one, , initializes a collection by passing in an existing collection of zones. 类包含 属性。The class contains an property. 此属性允许您 通过传入字符串标识符来查找集合中的控件。This property allows you to locate a control within the collection by passing in a string identifier. 通过将字符串标识符与区域中属性的值进行匹配来查找区域 。The zone is located by matching the string identifier to the value of the property on a zone. 类还有几种方法，可用于检查或访问其内容。The class also has several methods that are useful for examining or accessing its contents. 方法确定集合中是否存在特定区域。The method determines whether a particular zone exists in the collection. 方法将集合复制到对象的数组 。The method copies the collection to an array of objects. 最后， 方法返回集合中特定区域的索引。Finally, the method returns the index of a particular zone within the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class. 此代码示例包含三个部分：代码的两个部分以及如何运行此示例的说明。The code example contains three parts: two sections of code, and an explanation of how to run the example. 此代码示例的第一部分是包含三个控件的网页 ，其中每个控件都包含一个服务器控件。The first part of the code example is a Web page that contains three controls, each of which contains a single server control. 尽管这些服务器控件都是标准的 ASP.NET 控件，但它们可以 在运行时充当控件，因为它们位于某个 区域内。Although these server controls are all standard ASP.NET controls, they can act as controls at run time because they are placed within a zone. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/CS/webpartzonecollection_overview_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/VB/webpartzonecollection_overview_vb.aspx#1)] 此代码示例的第二部分是分部类，其中包含用于演示类的用法的代码 。The second part of the code example is the partial class that contains the code to demonstrate usage of the class. 此代码处理网页的事件。This code handles the events for the Web page. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/CS/webpartzonecollection_overview.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/VB/webpartzonecollection_overview.vb#2)] 在浏览器中加载页面。Load the page in a browser. 这三个 区域在其包含的服务器控件中可见。The three zones are visible with their contained server controls. 页面底部附近有多个按钮，其中每个按钮都演示了使用对象的某个方面 。Near the bottom of the page are several buttons, each of which demonstrates some aspect of working with the object. 单击每个按钮，查看其对区域及其内容的影响。Click each button to see its effect on the zones and their contents. 若要查看与每个显示对象的某个方面的按钮相关联的代码 ，请查看上面引用的分部类文件中的代码，作为此代码示例的第二部分。To view the code associated with each button that demonstrates some aspect of the object, view the code in the partial class file referenced above as the second part of this code example.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 构造函数由 控件、Web 部件控件集中的其他控件或自定义开发人员代码使用，以创建 Web 部件页上存在的控件的只读集合。The constructor is used by the control, by other controls in the Web Parts control set, or by custom developer code, to create a read-only collection of the controls that exist on a Web Parts page.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

summary.span: 初始化 类的空实例。

span.span: Initializes an empty instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件在其自己的构造函数中使用此构造函数来初始化 Web 部件页的类的新实例 。The control uses this constructor within its own constructor to initialize a new instance of the class for a Web Parts page.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.ICollection webPartZones) cil managed

span.span: An of objects.

summary.span: 通过传入 对象的集合来初始化 类的实例。

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class by passing in a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要创建对象的自定义集合 以对其执行编程操作，请使用构造函数。Use the constructor when you want to create a custom collection of objects to carry out programmatic operations on them. 例如，你可以访问 属性并 在 Web 部件页上创建对象的子集，并将其分配给 对象，然后在子控件上执行操作，或仅对该区域子集的各个属性执行操作。For example, you could access the property and create a subset of objects on a Web Parts page, assigning them to a object, and then carry out operations on the child controls or various properties of only that subset of zones. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 构造函数。The following code example demonstrates the use of the constructor. 该示例的完整代码位于类概述的 "示例" 部分 。The complete code for the example is found in the Example section of the class overview. 请注意，在下面的代码部分中，它 通过检索属性的值将对象分配给变量 。In the following section of code, notice that it assigns a object to a variable by retrieving the value of the property. 如果需要， 您可以创建一个对象数组， 其中包含该页上所有区域的子集，并将该数组分配给新的 对象。If you wanted, rather than assigning all the zones from the property, you could create an array of objects containing a subset of all the zones on the page, and assign the array to a new object. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/CS/webpartzonecollection_overview.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/VB/webpartzonecollection_overview.vb#6)] 创建集合后，可以轻松地循环访问集合，并对所有包含的区域或其内容执行操作。After the collection is created, you can easily iterate through the collection and perform operations on all the contained zones or their contents. 若要执行示例代码，请在浏览器中加载页面，然后单击每个区域上的 " **切换谓词呈现模式** " 按钮。To execute the example code, load the page in a browser, and click the **Toggle Verb Render Mode** button on each zone. 这会替换区域中包含的每个服务器控件的标题栏中的谓词的呈现方式。This alternates how the verbs in the title bar of each server control contained in a zone are rendered. 谓词可以出现在下拉菜单中，或直接作为标题栏中的链接。The verbs can appear in a drop-down menu, or directly as links in the title bar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法，可以检查特定 对象并确定该对象是否在 集合中。The method enables you to check a particular object and determine whether it is in a collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的用法 。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. 类概述的 "示例" 部分中提供了此示例的完整代码，包括用户控件、包含这些区域的页面以及包含代码的分部类文件 。The complete code for the example, including a user control, a page containing the zones, and a partial class file that contains the code, is found in the Example section of the class overview. 下面的代码部分演示方法的用法 。The following section of code demonstrates usage of the method. 若要执行代码，请在浏览器中加载页面，然后单击 "Coll" （ **包含 WebPartZone2** ）按钮。To execute the code, load the page in a browser, and click the **Coll. Contains WebPartZone2** button. span.span: The starting point in the array at which to place the collection contents.

summary.span: 将集合复制到 对象的数组。

span.span: Copies the collection to an array of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要创建一个自定义数组，该数组可以包含集合中的区域 、这些区域的子集或这些区域的超集，则方法非常有用。The method is useful when you want to create a custom array that can contain the zones in the collection, a subset of those zones, or a superset of those zones. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的用法 。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. 类概述的 "示例" 部分中提供了此示例的完整代码，包括用户控件、包含这些区域的页面以及包含代码的分部类文件 。The complete code for the example, including a user control, a page containing the zones, and a partial class file that contains the code, is found in the Example section of the class overview. 下面的代码部分演示方法的用法 。The following section of the code demonstrates usage of the method. 若要执行该代码，请在浏览器中加载此页，然后单击 "数组" 按钮中的 **区域名称** 。To execute the code, load the page in a browser, and click the **Zone Names from Array** button. 区域的集合被加载到数组中，所有区域 Id 都复制到一个标签中。The collection of zones is loaded into an array, and all zone IDs are copied into a label. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/CS/webpartzonecollection_overview.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/VB/webpartzonecollection_overview.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 Web 部件页面上有多个区域，并且需要知道某个区域相对于其他区域的序号位置，则此方法很有用。The method is useful if you have multiple zones on a Web Parts page, and you need to know the ordinal position of one zone relative to the other zones. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示方法的用法 。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. 类概述的 "示例" 部分中提供了此示例的完整代码，包括用户控件、包含这些区域的页面以及包含代码的分部类文件 。The complete code for the example, including a user control, a page containing the zones, and a partial class file that contains the code, is found in the Example section of the class overview. 下面的代码部分演示方法的用法 。The following section of code demonstrates usage of the method. 若要执行代码，请在浏览器中加载页面，然后单击 " **WebPartZone1" 索引** 按钮。To execute the code, load the page in a browser, and click the **WebPartZone1 Index** button. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/CS/webpartzonecollection_overview.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartZoneCollection_Overview/VB/webpartzonecollection_overview.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使你可以 通过使用表示其在集合中的序号位置的索引号来访问集合中的对象。The property enables you to access a object within a collection by using an index number that represents its ordinal position in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使您能够 通过使用特定区域的字符串标识符来访问集合中的对象。The property enables you to access a object within a collection by using a string identifier for a particular zone. 字符串标识符上的所有匹配项不区分大小写。All matching on string identifiers is case-insensitive.
